channel.title: Sweet on Tiny Tavern
channel.description: Recent content in Sweet on Tiny Tavern

item.title: Blueberry Pancakes
item.description: A stack of fluffy, blueberry pancakes dusted with powdered sugar, topped with whipped cream and blueberry compote.

item.title: Blueberry Waffles
item.description: A stack of fluffy, blueberry waffles dusted with powdered sugar and topped with whipped cream and blueberry compote.

item.title: Chocolate Chip Pancakes
item.description: A stack of fluffy, chocolate chip pancakes dusted with powdered sugar and topped with whipped cream and ice cream.

item.title: Chocolate Chip Waffles
item.description: A stack of fluffy, chocolate chip waffles dusted with powdered sugar and topped with whipped cream and ice cream.

item.title: Cinnamon Swirl Pancakes
item.description: A stack of fluffy, cinnamon swirl pancakes dusted with powdered sugar and topped with whipped cream.

item.title: Cinnamon Toast Waffles
item.description: A stack of fluffy, cinnamon toast waffles dusted with powdered sugar and topped with whipped cream.

item.title: Classic French Toast Platter
item.description: 2 slices of toast dusted with powdered sugar, served with syrup and scrambled eggs.

item.title: Pancake/Waffle Platter
item.description: (Served with jam, compote, or whipped cream) 3 pancakes or waffles of your choice, 2 scrambled eggs, 2 crispy turkey bacon or saut√©ed sausages, and 2 slices of toast.

item.title: Regular Pancakes
item.description: A stack of fluffy, traditional pancakes dusted with powdered sugar and topped with strawberry/guava jam or strawberry/blueberry compote and whipped cream.

item.title: Regular Waffles
item.description: A stack of fluffy, classic waffles dusted with powdered sugar and topped with whipped cream and strawberry/blueberry compote.
